divs: Sighting Detailsmy wife was droping me offwork. the smoke trail make us notice it. it was soclose i had no problems to figure out it was a ufo. we stay inside my minivanjust staring at it, we was in shock. the object was a big long cilindrical shapeship it was leaving a smoke trail and then flames start coming out,after that itwhen start gaining speed so fast it disapeart.
